title: Anyone interested in trading their N172 Tip O'Neill for an N172 Billy Serad?
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: Anyone interested in trading their N172 Tip O'Neill for an N172 Billy Serad?
posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

Just as the title says...I have an SGC A Billy Serad (Toronto) and am just throwing the feelers out to see if anyone wants it in exchange for a comparable N172 of the Woodstock Wonder.  Am more interested in the quality of the image than anything else about the card.  And if I actually had the choice, I'd prefer a batting or throwing pose instead of that odd bent over fielding pose.

Anyway, a scan of Serad can be seen here:  [IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/N172_Serad.jpg[/IMG]

Email (richard@richardarmstrong.ca), PM or post here if you wanna talk.

Regards,

Richard.
